q: how safe is this sport in the video
pred: The sport in the video appears to be safe, as it involves people riding on water skis and wakeboards, and they are all wearing life jackets. The video shows them enjoying their time on the water and performing various tricks. However, it is essential to note that the safety of the sport depends on the skill level of the participants, the presence of a spotter, and the proper use of safety equipment.
